section.title: History and acknowledgments
section.para: IMP is the integration of six years of research, three system configuration tool prototypes, the use of most of the state-of-the-art tools available on the market and hours of dicussions with system administrators around the world that are doing the real work on a day to day basis. This reasearch track was started in 2006 by Thomas Delaet under the supervision of Wouter Joosen at DistriNet, KULeuven. In 2007 Bart Vanbrabant joined while working on this master thesis and in 2008 working full time on this research.
This work would not have been possible without the support and funding of DistriNet, KULeuven, iMinds and the two personal scholarschips of the IWT.
